snippet.title: David Hoffman
snippet.description:
Please. To help me to continue my efforts to post a video a day from my archive, support me at www.patreon.com/allinaday or at www.paypal.me/davidhoffmanfilms.  I have been making documentary films and working on film crews–now video crews of course–since I was 21 years old. I am now 77 (December, 2018). I love real people and while I enjoy filming and doing interviews with famous folks, is the ordinary people and their wonderful extraordinary lives and stories that most fascinate me. I made this YouTube channel to share my work with others–thinking of 3 generations. Mine. Those people now in their forties and fifties. And millennials.  I have very supportive of my subscribers and communicate with them as often as I can. My hope is to continue to grow my channel and someday make my living from my YouTube clips and the advertising YouTube allows. Thank you.
www.whoisdavidhoffman.com
